column4: Madpilot... I'm a professional pilot. I assume the reason they contacted me was that the laptop belonged to an faa employee that lost his/her laptop. The laptop was florida pilot specific.
Madpilot... I'm not worried about my install... I'm just curious about the present state of linux security.
the safety of linux is really unknown, as it isn't strongly attacked.  vandals like to attach where they do the most damage
